testcase.name: Given a default recipe book(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And the coffee maker is in waiting state(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And the user has selected purchase coffee(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And the user pays more than the cost of the beverage "60"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
When the user has chosen to purchase valid recipe number "1"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
Then the inventory should have been decremented appropriately "1"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And there should be change provided "10"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And the current status of the coffee maker is "OK"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
And the current mode of the coffee maker is "WAITING"(Scenario: TC 7.3 - Purchase Beverage - Happy Path - pays more than the cost
